title: spreading mechanism
extract: A eukaryotic cell spreads over a substrate in distinct stages, with the earliest events characterized by passive adhesion and cell deformation. Recent work suggests a common physical mechanism can explain the early stages of cell spreading for a wide range of cell types and substrates.May 15, 2007
